# File lib/erector/erect.rb, line 86
    def to_erector
      files.each do |file|
        say "Erecting #{file}... "
        begin
          e = Erector::Erected.new(file)
          e.convert
          say " --> #{e.filename}\n"
        rescue => e
          puts e
          puts e.backtrace.join("\n\t")
          @success = false
        end
      end
    end
